languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}," {n}— обвисшие губы регента кривятся в снисходительной ухмылке, —{/n} "мы надеемся, в скором времени протекторат фон Валанциус окрепнет, и вы поразите всех нас {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}приемами, не уступающими тем, что устраивают ваши наперсники{/d}".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}," {n}- обвисшие губы регента кривятся в снисходительной ухмылке,- {/n} "мы надеемся, в скором времени торговая империя фон Валанциус окрепнет, и вы поразите всех нас приемами, не уступающим тем, что устраивают ваши наперсники".

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}." {n}The regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer.{/n} "We hope the von Valancius protectorate finds its bearings soon and you astound us with {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}functions every bit as grand as those of your peers{/d}."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}," {n}— обвисшие губы регента кривятся в снисходительной ухмылке, —{/n} "мы надеемся, в скором времени протекторат фон Валанциус окрепнет, и вы поразите всех нас {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}приемами, не уступающими тем, что устраивают ваши наперсники{/d}".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}," {n}- the regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer,- {/n} "we hope von Valancius merchant empire finds its bearings soon and you astound us with public functions no less grand than those of your magnanimous peers."

"{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}," {n}- the regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer,- {/n} "we hope von Valancius merchant empire finds its bearings soon and you astound us with public functions no less grand than those of your magnanimous peers."

"{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}." {n}The regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer. {/n} "We hope the von Valancius trade empire finds its bearings soon and you astound us with functions every bit as grand as those of your peers."

"{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}." {n}The regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer. {/n} "We hope the von Valancius protectorate finds its bearings soon and you astound us with functions every bit as grand as those of your peers."

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。”{n}摄政王下垂的唇边，露出了屈尊纡贵的冷笑。{/n}“我们希望冯·瓦兰修斯王朝很快能找到它该在的位置，也希望{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}您的功绩能像其他行商浪人一样{/d}，让我们赞叹不已。”
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}." {n}The regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer.{/n} "We hope the von Valancius protectorate finds its bearings soon and you astound us with {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}functions every bit as grand as those of your peers{/d}."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。”{n}摄政王下垂的唇边，露出了屈尊纡贵的冷笑。{/n}“我们希望冯·瓦兰修斯王朝很快能找到它该在的位置，也希望您的功绩能像其他行商浪人一样，让我们赞叹不已。”
“{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。”{n}摄政王下垂的唇边，露出了屈尊纡贵的冷笑。{/n}“我们希望冯·瓦兰修斯王朝很快能找到它该在的位置，也希望{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}您的功绩能像其他行商浪人一样{/d}，让我们赞叹不已。”

languages.text: «{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}». {n}Los labios hundidos del regente se giran en una mueca condescendiente. {/n} «Esperamos que el protectorado von Valancius pronto recupere la normalidad para que pueda asombrarnos con {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}recepciones tan lujosas como las de sus pares{/d}».
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}." {n}The regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer.{/n} "We hope the von Valancius protectorate finds its bearings soon and you astound us with {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}functions every bit as grand as those of your peers{/d}."

traits.locale_text: «{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}». {n}Los labios hundidos del regente se giran en una mueca condescendiente. {/n} «Esperamos que el protectorado von Valancius pronto recupere la normalidad para que pueda asombrarnos con recepciones tan lujosas como las de sus pares».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}」{n}摂政のたるんだ唇が慇懃な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領がすぐに軸を見出し、あなたが同業者たちと{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}同じくらい壮大な機能{/d}で我々を驚かせることを願っている」
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}." {n}The regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer.{/n} "We hope the von Valancius protectorate finds its bearings soon and you astound us with {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}functions every bit as grand as those of your peers{/d}."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}」{n}摂政のたるんだ唇が慇懃な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領がすぐに軸を見出し、あなたが同業者たちと{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}同じくらい壮大な機能{/d}で我々を驚かせることを願っている」
「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}」{n}摂政のたるんだ唇が慇懃な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領がすぐに軸を見出し、あなたが同業者たちと{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}同じくらい壮大な機能{/d}で我々を驚かせることを願っている」

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}." {n}Die hängenden Lippen des Regenten verziehen sich zu einem missbilligenden, höhnischen Lächeln. {/n} "Wir hoffen, dass das Protektorat von Valancius schon bald seine Position findet und {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}Ihr uns mit genauso großartigen Festen erstaunt wie Eure Kollegen{/d}."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}." {n}The regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer.{/n} "We hope the von Valancius protectorate finds its bearings soon and you astound us with {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}functions every bit as grand as those of your peers{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Die hängenden Lippen des Regenten verziehen sich zu einem missbilligenden, höhnischen Lächeln. {/n} "Wir hoffen, dass das Protektorat von Valancius schon bald seine Position findet und Ihr uns mit genauso großartigen Festen erstaunt wie Eure Kollegen."

languages.text: « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}{/g}. »{n}Les lèvres pendantes du régent se tordent jusqu'à former un sourire condescendant.{/n} « Nous espérons que le protectorat von Valancius retrouvera bientôt toute sa gloire d'antan et que vous nous éblouirez de {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}festivités aussi grandioses que celles de vos pairs{/d}. »
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}." {n}The regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer.{/n} "We hope the von Valancius protectorate finds its bearings soon and you astound us with {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}functions every bit as grand as those of your peers{/d}."

traits.locale_text: « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}{/g}. »{n}Les lèvres du régent s'affaissent jusqu'à former un sourire condescendant. {/n}« Nous espérons que le protectorat von Valancius retrouvera bientôt toute sa gloire d'antan et que vous nous éblouirez de festivités aussi grandioses que celles de vos pairs. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}." {n}Naibin sarkan dudaklarında hor gören bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Dileriz von Valancius protektorası en yakın zamanda kendini toparlar, siz de {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}öncüllerinizinkilere benzer ulu eylemlerle{/d} bizi kendinize hayran bırakırsınız."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}." {n}The regent's sagging lips twist in a condescending sneer.{/n} "We hope the von Valancius protectorate finds its bearings soon and you astound us with {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_HumbleWelcome}functions every bit as grand as those of your peers{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}." {n}Naibin sarkan dudaklarında hor gören bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Dileriz von Valancius protektorası en yakın zamanda kendini toparlar ve siz de öncüllerinizinkilere benzer ulu eylemlerle bizi kendinize hayran bırakırsınız."
